pr_body:
Bandit is a tool designed to find common security issues in Python code.

Running Bandit on Fastkml throws  Error B101 ; assert_used --> "Use of assert detected. The enclosed code will be removed when compiling to optimised byte code."

Instead of assert, we can raise Assertion Error, which removes the Bandit error. I have made the respective changes which can be seen in my commits.

This fixes Issue #89 .
